channel.title: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?
channel.description:
So, that's it: post your opinions.
- I miss the first APC fight , where you get the monted gun and shoot metrocops. - Like the use of the EP2 vorts, but miss the energy bean of the first vort, recharging batteries. Liked much more that bean than those shiny spheres (they remember the scene of the final boss of Opposing force).

item.title: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
get a new graphics card
you can probably get one that runs it well for less than $20, though I’m not really up to date with prices or anything

but I’m pretty sure an old high end card can run it fine, and since it’s old it shouldn’t cost too much

Read full topic

item.title: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?
item.dc:creator: duh4563
item.description:
i dislike the updated engine/graphics
i dont have a great grapics card so i went from being able to run hl2 on high at 1024 x 768 resolution to only being able to run it on low at 800 x 600

Read full topic
item.source: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?

item.title: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?
item.dc:creator: Pettifogg
item.description:
Hypno-Toad:

I don’t know if you guys have this… but ever since the Mac update, when i get to Black Mesa East the lights and shadows all get so fucked up. When I’m on the coast, and i go through a Highway tunnel, it looks as if it’s a rainy day, but, the tunnel isn’t dark at all, this happens until the chapter “Entanglement.” I haven’t found a fix to it yet, and it doesnt change the gameplay. I just don’t like it because it makes the gloomy, dark parts look horribly colored, and the nice, colorful parts look gloomy

mat_fullbright 0

Also, I generally like it, apart from the few bugs. And also how they slowed the buggy down so you can’t race the train without dying.

Read full topic
item.source: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?

item.title: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?
item.dc:creator: Ham_Solo
item.description:
I like the updated engine, especially the water coastside seems alot less repetitive now.
Also on my machine the updated engine runs more smoothly, no lags at full detail and shorter loading times.

That alot of mods needed fixing was a downside, but didn’t affect that many mods I play.
Also the bugs that occured ingame after the update, but valve fixed them.

TL;DR:
Big “yay” from me.

Read full topic

Dislike: Goodbye DX7 support, goodbye support for non-sse CPU’s, hello bugs and glitches

item.source: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?

item.title: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?
item.dc:creator: Hypno-Toad
item.description:
I don’t know if you guys have this… but ever since the Mac update, when i get to Black Mesa East the lights and shadows all get so fucked up. When I’m on the coast, and i go through a Highway tunnel, it looks as if it’s a rainy day, but, the tunnel isn’t dark at all, this happens until the chapter “Entanglement.” I haven’t found a fix to it yet, and it doesnt change the gameplay. I just don’t like it because it makes the gloomy, dark parts look horribly colored, and the nice, colorful parts look gloomy

What I do like however, is the motion blur and AA, I’m pretty sure the version before didn’t have it (at least the motion blur.)

Read full topic
item.source: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?

item.title: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?
item.dc:creator: JeffMOD
item.description:
Uh, the “APC fight” is still there. No part of the game was cut in the update. :\

I like how they used HDR, but I don’t like how they only put it in the coast maps onwards. I also like how they marked more of the caches, but some of them (like the ones in Nova Prospekt) don’t make sense, so that’s a dislike as well.
I’m undecided on achievements, because my gaming PC is rarely connected to the internet, and as such I don’t use steam cloud.

Read full topic
item.source: What you like/dislike with HL2 last updates?

i’m usually not big on achievements, but they gave me reason to play HL2 for the fourth time.
